title: SmartSalonBot
body: A salon manager web app built using React and styled with Tailwind CSS. Converted the Figma design into a web app.

title: Prism SFA
body: PrismSFA is a Sales Force Management App with over 1000+ active users. I integrated APIs, tested them, and also integrated the Google Maps Geolocation API (a third-party API).

title: CodeAspire.com
body: The official website of CodeAspire Consultancy. I created and enhanced custom UI components as per the requirements.

title: Portfolio Website
body: A portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills. Designed with a minimalist aesthetic and built using Next.js and the Aceternity UI library.

title: Blog Website
body: A Backend as a Service (BaaS) website showcasing my projects and skills. Designed with a minimalist aesthetic and built using React, Tailwind CSS, along with Appwrite as a Backend Service.

title: UI Design for SmartSalonBot
body: A UI/UX design project for a salon web app, focusing on intuitive navigation and visually appealing interfaces. Created using Figma.
